attributes.action: the stopping of legal aid for family law and domestic violence should be halted
attributes.additional_details: An illegal immigrant cost the tax payer £131,000 which is being taken from an already over stretched budget. I personally have been fighting for legal aid for a year and am still fighting for this
attributes.background: Legal Aid was originally started to help fund access to the legal system when they were unable to self fund

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on the Government to undo the changes to civil legal aid, which includes family law and domestic violence.

You could also start a petition calling on the Government to reverse its cuts and remove the income thresholds to be eligible for legal aid.
